name: Isolation (itch) (Laughing Tree, Ryan, O37, Zain)
description:
A quaint simulator of being stuck in your room.
Made for the theme "No Way Out" for LM0B #22
Controls: LMB to pick up objects, RMB to interact with certain objects.
Art by Zain https://r0bot.itch.io/
Programming by Leo https://o37.itch.io/
Music by Ryan https://parallaxdream.itch.io/
